LanguageData.AYCharcoalKiln.label: Charcoal Kiln
LanguageData.AYCharcoalKiln.description: A temporary crude structure made from stone and filled with wood that will slowly burn with limited air supply to produce charcoal.
LanguageData.AYCharcoalKiln_Blueprint.label: Charcoal Kiln (blueprint)
LanguageData.AYCharcoalKiln_Frame.label: Charcoal Kiln (building)
LanguageData.AYCharcoalKiln_Frame.description: A temporary crude structure made from stone and filled with wood that will slowly burn with limited air supply to produce charcoal.
